tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Dear, Dr Shruti Rai.

We're thankful for a new born baby *GIRL* dated *January 11, 2024* .
She is not only an Excellent Doctor, she is simple, Superb Human Being, Sober, approachable, a great gynaecologist, friendly nature, approach with smiling face with her selfless services. Always amazing consultant/treatment. 
She is an extraordinary, intelligent Doctor with human values.
We have never had any issues getting our new born and have always felt very confident in her care. She has a very knowledgeable and friendly in nature.
I would (and do) recommend her clinic to anyone looking for a best treatment. She has an excellent care and expertise within  *Gynaecologist* & *Infertility Specialist* *(Mumbai)* .

Wish you a best of luck in future.

Best wishes
 *Siya Rakesh Punjabi*

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an amazing experience with Dr. Shruti starting from pre-pregnancy support till the normal delivery of my baby girl!She is available on WhatsApp and calls, has full clarity of various concerns faced during my pregnancy and communicates everything in clear words.I would highly recommend her for every woman who needs a good gynaec!

Dr Shruti Rai immediately made me feel at ease and gave me confidence.  She was clear about the diagnosis and also provided a practical approach to the ailment.
Follow up, attention ******** *********** ********* *** *** ** *** ******* **** ********
I highly recommend Dr Shruti Rai *** *** ***** *** **********

Dr. Shruti has been extremely friendly, prompt, alert and attentive throughout my time consulting her. I saw her for general check ups early on and then for treating a mild PCOS I live with. What's great about her is that she's non judgemental and understanding. She discusses the course of treatment and alternate lifestyle changes while most other doctors prefer to simply write a prescription and send you on your way. Highly recommended!
reply_text: Thank u for your kind wordsüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is friendly, makes 'to be parent' aware of traditional and modern medicines and allows them to choose. She gives cost effective options for different tests also. She always made me comfortable whenever I had questions. I would definitely recommend her. I am blessed with beautiful girl and it was normal delivery. Thank You Dr.

Dr. Shruti is very warm and empathatic towards her patients,  she listens carefully and understand her patient very well and recommend them the medicine and cure for it.  Very positive and highly professional and committed towards her work. *** ** *** **** ** *** **********. I'm strongly recommending her.

Dr.shruti is very humble doctor.she is caring responding very nicely with the patients. she is  available on whatsapp consultation as well whenever required in this covid times.I would highly recommend her to anyone who is looking for a **** gynecologist... Thanks to dr. Shruti
reply_text: Thank u so much take care

She was very patient listening to my concerns and provided explanation to them

review:
Dr Shruti Rai is wonderful doctor
She guided me well along with the all my questions in appropriate manner and gave me the right advice each time I visited her 
She is very much friendly and best person to be your gynecologist .

Dr. Shruti is very friendly doctor, she makes you comfortable so that she can guide you in the best way. I consulted her for PCOS since my periods were irregular. She guided me well and also helped me with my diet intake. She explains the logic behind the issue and also tells you precautions to take. I would definately recommend her
